pokedex.title: pokédex
pokedex.description: You can search for a pokémon and see all their stats.

calculator.title: calculator
calculator.description: One of the five freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries projects: it can handle all basic math operations: addition, substraction, multiplication and division.

drumMachine.title: drum machine
drumMachine.description: One of the five freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries projecs: you can play with 18 sounds and have fun.

markdownPreviewer.title: markdown previewer
markdownPreviewer.description: One of the five freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries projecs: you can write markdown and it will be translated to HTML (with code highlight!).

randomQuoteMachine.title: random quote machine
randomQuoteMachine.description: One of the five freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries projecs: it just gives random quotes from different kinds of people while changing the background color.

breakClock.title: 25 + 5 clock
breakClock.description: One of the five freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries projecs: One clock to rule them all, one clock to find them, One clock to bring them all, and in the repo bind them; In the Land of Github where the shadows lie.
